summary: Disables water emerging breath sound if under the effect of waterbreathing.
descriptionHtml:
This small addon adds couple of dialogue conditions so that water emerging breath sound no longer plays if under the effect of waterbreathing. Supports all kind of default and custom waterbreathing effects like Argonian ability, waterbreathing potions, waterbreathing enchants or anything else you can imagine, even waterbreathing effects added by other mods.

If you are upgrading from previous verison make sure you delete old ESP because this one comes with a new name.

Enjoy!


If you like this mod you might also like:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14950]Convenient Horses[/url] by Alek
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10753]Auto Unequip Arrows[/url] by Alek
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13298]Auto Unequip Helmet[/url] by Alek
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11609]Follower Trap Safety[/url] by Alek
author: Alek
